column4: Whenever I install for all the updates from Update Manager, I always get "Package operation failed " message window at the end of update process. It says "The installation or removal of a software package failed ". What should I do not to get this message window ?

Whenever I install for all the updates from Update Manager, I always get "Package operation failed " message window at the end of update process. It says "The installation or removal of a software package failed ". What should I do not to get this message window ?
you could try to select another mirror
